dialogue.introduction: Good morning~~. Asashio Destroyer number six, Yamagumo. Please treat me well!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the sixth Asashio-class destroyer, Yamagumo~ I was born in Osaka and raised in Yokosuka~ Uh-huh, I'll have to watch out for sea mines~ I was active in escort and patrol missions, then deployed to the Marianas and also Leyte Gulf as part of the Nishimura fleet~
dialogue.secretary2: You can't do that~. That's delicate~. The depth charges, they're sensitive~.
dialogue.secretary3: U~m~, sorry. If you're too pushy, I'll seriously get angry, you know?
dialogue.secretaryidle: U~m~ Yamagumo kind of likes having free time~ But Asagumo-nee~ she's an impatient person~ you know~?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander, you're working so hard~ How admirable~ Yamagumo thinks that you're really quite amazing~ Yes, really!
dialogue.wedding: Commander, what is it? Are you giving this box to Yamagumo? I wonder what it is? Ooh, pretty~ Thank you~
dialogue.show_players_score: Information, I see. That's really important, isn't it?
dialogue.equipment2: How is it~? Does it suit Yamagumo~? Really~?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I guess a bath is nice too~
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Uh, I'm sorry~ I'll take it easy with a bath~
dialogue.docking_complete: A girl have just came out of the bath~
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned~. Oh, that's good~, isn't it?
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Oh, Asagumo-nee? Do you want to go together?
dialogue.attack: Uh-huh~ I want to hit as much as possible~
dialogue.night_battle: Night battles~ Yamagumo might just be a li~ttle bit bad at them~
dialogue.mvp: Huh~ Yamagumo was the best~? Oh, I guess that could happen~ That's interesting~
dialogue.minor_damaged2: No~ Yamagumo is weak against attacks~!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I guess I need to get a bi~t more serious.
dialogue.sunk: I'm sinking, huh... Asagumo-nee... don't come... okay?... See you... later...
dialogue.new_year_2015: Commander-san~, Happy~ New Year~! ...Yamagumo will be in your care this year too~!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, today is special right? Yamagumo is happy to be able to be with you.
dialogue.christmas_2015: It's Christmas, isn't it? Commander, what would you like as a present?

hourly.0000: Commander~ Yamagumo is today's secretary huh...sure, I'll do it!
hourly.0100: 01...00! Am I doing it right? Is that so?
hourly.0200: 02...00! Midnight's over~ For some reason, I feel pretty nervous around this time...
hourly.0300: 03...00! Around this time, I start to feel strange...fuu~
hourly.0500: 05...00! Commander, morning is near! How reassuring....right?
hourly.0600: 06..00! It's daytime! We'll need to wake everyone up! I like the morning.
hourly.0700: 07...00! Commander, I will leave your breakfast here. Today's breakfast includes a fresh egg...be sure to put it on top of your rice!
hourly.0800: 08...00! Isn't egg mixed with rice tasty? It's also tasty with brown rice...Yamagumo likes it too!
hourly.0900: 09...00! Oh right, during today's lunch, I'm going with Asagumo on a date! A date...isn't that nice? I'm looking forward to it!
hourly.1000: 10...00! Asagumo is a soft person...that's why I like her!
hourly.1100: 11...00! Commander, how do I look? I look fine? Alright, I'm heading out!
hourly.1200: 12...00! Is that...Fusou and Yamashiro? Uuh, for some reason, my stomach is starting to hurt...uuh, guess I'll go home...
hourly.1300: 13...00! Commander, I am fine now! I made a U-turn and came back~ I'll return to work now~
hourly.1400: 14...00! All members of the expedition team are accounted for! Mission progress is okay! Commander, the fleet is doing well~
hourly.1500: 15...00! Ah, these? They are vegetables I grew from my own garden! I was taught how to do that in Rabaul~
hourly.1600: 16...00! If you boil these vegetables, add a lot of sugar and make it into a jam, its surprisingly tasty! See?
hourly.1700: 1700! Before you know it, its already evening....the day sure goes quickly~
hourly.1800: 18...00! Yamagumo will be making dinner tonight! I'll be making a curry using my home grown vegetables! It's delicious!
hourly.1900: 1900! Yamagumo's home grown vegetable curry was good right? Hm? Who did I grow these vegetables with? I did it with Asagumo!
hourly.2000: 20..00! After this, I'm going on a date with Asagumo again, I can't wait! My tie isn't crooked right? I feel nervous~
hourly.2100: 21...00! I'm heading off! Asagumo...! Huh...who is....that? They look....close....Huh...? Tears are...falling out of my....huh?
hourly.2200: 22...00....Commander...Asagumo is with an unknown guy...um...eh? That's not right? Is that what it is? Oh, is that all~
hourly.2300: 2300! What a relief...Asagumo is working huh~ Commander, Yamagumo is relieved...I felt so tense...
